name: Don't mess with Vampire
description:
After taking power by force and blood, a vampire, lord of his kingdom of Transylvania, suffers mutinies by the humans of the city. His goal is clear: to kill each assailant and rid his castle of these vermin. It's going to bleed!

Mechanics
